meanings.definition: A unit of capacitance equal to one trillionth of a farad.
meanings.sent1: I need a picofarad to complete the circuit.
meanings.sent2: The electronic device requires a picofarad for proper functioning.
meanings.sent3: Why did the capacitor break up with the resistor? Because it found a picofarad!
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a picofarad, storing tiny fragments of the past.
meanings.sent5: The picofarad was as small as a grain of sand, yet crucial for the experiment.
